geektank wrote:
> In case anyone missed it, Kent is working on a Test Driven 
> Development book and has a yahoo group set up for reviews.  He's on 
> vacation till around the 15th, so you've got time to review without 
> having to worry about the draft getting updated.  You can find the 
> latest draft in the files section.
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/testdrivendevelopment/
> 
> Erik Meade
> http://junit.org
> emeade@...

	Thanks Erik.

	I got a copy of the book. Looks interesting.

	I noticed that Kent uses an assertFalse() method
	in his examples.

	JUnit 3.7 Assert class does not have that method.

	Is it a new method to be introduced in JUnit 3.8?

	
		Daniel
-- 
              Daniel Le Berre mailto:leberre@...-artois.fr
              Maitre de Conferences,  CRIL,  Universite d'Artois
              http://www.cril.univ-artois.fr/~leberre
subject: Re: [junit] Kent Beck's Test Driven Development Book
